AAD.caption: ID of Input
AAD.doc: The element which will listen for ENTER press. Needs to be a unique ID. Will break if more than one element has the same ID on the page.
AAD.name: inputID

AAE.caption: ID of Submit Button
AAE.doc: The element to be triggered when ENTER is pressed from the input.  Needs to be a unique ID. Will break if more than one element has the same ID on the page.
AAE.name: submitID

AAG.caption: Re-focus input after sending
AAG.doc: When this box is checked, the input will be reset and re-focused after [Enter] is typed. Do not use this option if you are manually resetting and focusing in your Bubble workflow.
AAG.name: Refocus
